## Builder.text() method

Adds a text control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
text<T>(target: T, property: keyof T, opts?: Partial<TextModel>): TextModel<any> & Removable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | <code>T</code> | The target object holding the value |
|  property | <code>keyof T</code> | The accessor property |
|  opts | <code>Partial&lt;TextModel&gt;</code> | Additional options for the control |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TextModel<any> & Removable`
